name: Aki High Demo!
description:
Welcome to the official Aki High itch.io page!

I started making this game about 2 and a half months ago, and now that I have fully learned everything about Ren'py, I can say with confidence that the game is on the right track to completion!

I understand that because this is my first game, there are going to be some major glitches and spelling errors that could occur... And because of that, I have left not only a discussion discord server but also my email address if you find any glitches and/or spelling errors. 

Discord!

Email: charlesotnsingleton@gmail.com

Those are also up for Suggestions, questions, and overall just to chat as well.

Anyways, keep being awesome!

-Tate
